portfolio.title: NFT Viewer - VR
portfolio.description: An NFT Viewing website in VR which gives owned NFTs of connected wallet or provided address on Ethereum and Polygon Chain.

portfolio.title: AR Business Card
portfolio.description: WebXR project that uses image tracking in a web browser to track and animate business cards in AR.

portfolio.title: AR Guitar Tutor
portfolio.description: AR Experience that helps you learn guitar chords in AR using image tracking.

portfolio.title: Pokédex Kanto
portfolio.description: AR Experience to recognize and give info about all Pokemons in Kanto Region using Machine Learning.

portfolio.title: Sign Language
portfolio.description: AR Experience that uses hand tracking for recognition of American Sign Language hand gestures for english alphabets.

portfolio.title: Learn Languages
portfolio.description: An augmented reality and machine learning project that utilizes object detection to display the translated names of detected objects in multiple languages.

portfolio.title: Car Refuel
portfolio.description: Snapchat AR game lens compatible with Snap's AR Glasses to control and refuel a car by collecting fuel cans.

portfolio.title: AR Snooker
portfolio.description: An AR game for Snapchat, compatible with Snap's AR Glasses, where a snooker table is spawned on the floor, allowing users to play the game in a realistic and interactive way.

portfolio.title: Mask Cleanup
portfolio.description: An interactive AR world experience to clean up masks that have been carelessly discarded on the ground and properly dispose of them in a virtual bin.

portfolio.title: KEC Daily Routine
portfolio.description: AR Poster created for KEC Daily Routine App. It uses image tracking to track and animate app's poster.

portfolio.title: SL Lion
portfolio.description: An AR lens for Viber that allows the user to transform their head into that of a lion, created to celebrate the Sri Lankan's participation in the T20 Cricket World Cup.

portfolio.title: Bull Hand
portfolio.description: AR Experience to track hand gesture and place a hand shaped bull developed for San Fermin.

portfolio.title: BD Tiger
portfolio.description: An AR lens for Viber that allows the user to transform their head into that of a tiger, created to celebrate the Bangladesh's participation in the T20 Cricket World Cup.

portfolio.title: Bakrid Mubarak
portfolio.description: Snapchat AR game created for Eid (Bakrid) to feed the sheep by tracking user's hand.

portfolio.title: Dashain Lens
portfolio.description: A Viber AR lens to mark the occasion of Dashain Festival, that allows users to celebrate and wish their loved ones a joyful and blessed celebration.

portfolio.title: Obstacle Avoiding Robot
portfolio.description: An obstacle-avoiding robot that uses ultrasonic sensors and an Arduino microcontroller to detect and navigate around objects in its environment.

portfolio.title: Dino Run
portfolio.description: Replica game of Google Chrome's T-Rex Run playable in No Internet Connection page of the browser, published as AR Filter in Instagram and Snapchat.

portfolio.title: Fly The Copter
portfolio.description: Snapchat game lens to fly a copter by tapping on the screen. Users can create high score and share it with friends.

portfolio.title: Coin Collect Game
portfolio.description: Snapchat game lens to collect gold coins falling by tracking user's head. Users can create high score and share it with friends.

portfolio.title: Easter Egg Catch
portfolio.description: Snapchat game lens to collect Easter Eggs by tracking user's head. Users can create high score and share it with friends.

portfolio.title: Me Malinga
portfolio.description: An AR lens for Sri Lankan former cricketer Malinga.

portfolio.title: Coca-Cola Dashain Lens
portfolio.description: A Viber AR lens for Coca-Cola Nepal to mark the occasion of Dashain Festival with flying kite.

portfolio.title: Falful Ninja
portfolio.description: A game developed in Unity3D, inspired by the beloved classic Fruit Ninja.

portfolio.title: Hangman Game
portfolio.description: The classic word-guessing hangman game made in Unity3D.

portfolio.title: Space Invaders
portfolio.description: A classic arcade game reimagined in Unity3D, where players must defend against waves of enemy spacecraft.

portfolio.title: Guess the Number
portfolio.description: A simple Unity3D game where players must correctly guess a randomly chosen number from 1 to 5 in order to win.

portfolio.title: Personal API
portfolio.description: A REST API with collection of endpoints for personal uses.

portfolio.title: Covid19 Updates Nepal
portfolio.description: A Twitter bot that tweets Nepal's COVID-19 cases updates on Twitter every day using data from the Nepal's Ministry of Health and Population.

portfolio.title: Pidit DJ
portfolio.description: A discord bot that plays music from multiple sources in Discord channels for users who want to enhance their Discord experience.

portfolio.title: VSnake Bot
portfolio.description: A discord bot for custom tasks like kick, react role assign, external API data, etc. to manage discord servers.

portfolio.title: NNZFSC Website
portfolio.description: A website for the Nepal New Zealand Friendship Society, developed using ReactJS and Django.

portfolio.title: Distracted Driver Detection
portfolio.description: This project aims to detect and alert distracted drivers in real-time using computer vision and machine learning.

portfolio.title: TIA Airport
portfolio.description: Illustration usable as geofilter in Snapchat for TIA Airport in Kathmandu, Nepal.

portfolio.title: TIA Airport
portfolio.description: Illustration usable as geofilter in Snapchat for TIA Airport in Kathmandu, Nepal.

portfolio.title: Boudhanath Stupa
portfolio.description: Illustration usable as geofilter in Snapchat for Boudhanath Stupa in Kathmandu, Nepal.

portfolio.title: Chabahil
portfolio.description: Illustration usable as geofilter in Snapchat for Chabahil in Kathmandu, Nepal.

portfolio.title: Chabahil
portfolio.description: Illustration usable as geofilter in Snapchat for Chabahil in Kathmandu, Nepal.

portfolio.title: Dhumbarahi
portfolio.description: Illustration usable as geofilter in Snapchat for Dhumbarahi in Kathmandu, Nepal.

portfolio.title: Durbarmargh
portfolio.description: Illustration usable as geofilter in Snapchat for Durbarmargh in Kathmandu, Nepal.

portfolio.title: Kathmandu
portfolio.description: Illustration usable as geofilter in Snapchat for Kathmandu in Kathmandu, Nepal.

portfolio.title: Dharahara
portfolio.description: Illustration usable as geofilter in Snapchat for Dharahara in Kathmandu, Nepal.

portfolio.title: KUSOM
portfolio.description: Illustration usable as geofilter in Snapchat for Kathmandu University School of Management in Kathmandu, Nepal.

portfolio.title: Maharajgunj
portfolio.description: Illustration usable as geofilter in Snapchat for Maharajgunj in Kathmandu, Nepal.

portfolio.title: Snapchat's next mission in AR
portfolio.description: I was mentioned in a CNET article for my work on the Learn Languages project. This project is an augmented reality and machine learning project that utilizes object detection to display the translated names of detected objects in multiple languages.

portfolio.title: SnapAR - Creator Spotlight
portfolio.description: In this piece, Snap AR showcases Lens Creators who are actively bringing languages to life through augmented reality. Cyrene Quiamco, creator of "Write LOVE Chinese," and I, creator of "Learn Hindi" and "Learn Yugambeh," were featured as prominent contributors. Our innovative approaches in utilizing AR technology to teach languages and raise awareness about cultural diversity are showcased, emphasizing the significant role AR plays in education.

portfolio.title: Lenslist
portfolio.description: I was featured in Lenslist's article titled "8 Snapchat Lens Creators You Should Know | April 2021". This article specifically highlights my works done using combination of augmented reality (AR) and machine learning (ML).

portfolio.title: SnapAR - Lens Fest 2020
portfolio.description: I was honored to speak at Snap's Lens fest 2020, along with a panel of creators on using augmented reality on Snapchat to drive social change. Our conversation covered topics such as our role and responsibility as creators, and crafting lenses for global accessibility.

portfolio.title: Hindustan Times
portfolio.description: I had the privilege of being featured in Hindustan Times' article titled "How to use Snapchat's Learn Hindi lens" where my contribution to developing an immersive AR lens on Snapchat was highlighted. The article provides step-by-step instructions on how to access and make the most of this language-learning experience.

portfolio.title: Heartbeat by Comet ML
portfolio.description: I was featured in an article titled "Snapchat Lens Creator Spotlight: Atit Kharel" published by Comet ML. This article captures the AR creations developed by me.

portfolio.title: The Indain Express
portfolio.description: I was featured in The Indian Express' article "Snapchat brings 'Learn Hindi' lens to celebrate Hindi Diwas: How it works" published on the occasion of Hindi Diwas 2020. It showcases my involvement in the development of the 'Learn Hindi' lens in collaboration with Snapchat.

portfolio.title: The Statesman
portfolio.description: I was featured in The Statesman's article "Learn six Indian language basics with AR lenses". The article highlights innovative use of augmented reality (AR) lenses to facilitate language learning, offering users an immersive and engaging experience to learn the basics of six Indian languages.

portfolio.title: Mid-Day
portfolio.description: I was featured in Mid-Day's article which highlights my use of augmented reality (AR) lenses for language learning, offering users an immersive and engaging experience to learn the basics of six Indian languages.
